tool_description: Get API access to iOS Store data
name: iOS Store
title: iOS Store

api_list.name: Get app reviews
api_list.description: This endpoint allows us to fetch app reviews given app Id

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description:
This parameter is to control sorting options in the iOS store.
Valid values - helpful | recent

api_list.name: Get similar apps
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches the similar apps to a given app Id

api_list.name: Get iOS App
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to fetch specific app from app Id

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: The endpoint is used to search iOS application
